column4: News; Stung Treng Province: On May 3
column5: the Anti-Drug Police Office revealed two suspects who had been detained for drug trafficking. 994.5 grams of methamphetamine were seized by authorities on the evening of May 2
column6: 2019 in Preah Rumkel commune.------A 70 year old local man and a 60 year old women were arrested. ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/836272.html
